sequence:
A Date With Atago

<size=45>Chapter 1: A Date Invitation</size>

scripts.say: One of the many responsibilities expected of the Commander and secretary are to be on duty.
This is a system that, in times of emergency, allows commanding officers to stay overnight at the base to avoid having to commute, but...
If called in during a day off, the regulations simply require that "the commander and the secretary must perform joint activities over the course of two days." Because of that...
Commander? It's already midnight, shouldn't you consider going to sleep?

options.content: Bring up the "date" for tomorrow that Atago mentioned.

scripts.say: You're off duty tomorrow, so just focus on resting. Let me handle the night shift.
Oh my, a date? That was a joke, you know~
Don't you think your whole "please accompany me to go shopping as part of our joint activities" was a bit too bland? Your big sister wanted to hear something a bit spicier~
Since we don't have anything to do tomorrow, I wouldn't mind staying with you as long as you'd like, you know~?
So, what do you need to buy?
Hmm, I suppose this is one of the few things that you can't get here, but also would be too much of a hassle to order online...
Since you've done your homework so thoroughly, your big sister will feel safe being escorted~
All right, let's go nice and early in the morning, so you should probably sleep soon.
I'm looking forward to our little outing~â™ª
